inclusion.criterion: scheduled to undergo radical prostatectomy at the Massachusetts General Hospital
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Anticipated intra-operative placement of an 18 or 20 French, latex or silicone urethral catheter at the conclusion of the operation (standard of care)
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Inability to speak, read or understand English
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Apparent sore, rash, or infection on the penis
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Anatomic abnormalities that would prevent proper application and use of the device
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Patients with significant physical or mental disability that, in the opinion of the treating surgeon, might prevent safe placement or removal of the device, or completion of the symptom-based survey.
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has a history of BPH and underwent multiple urological procedures, including suprapubic prostatectomy. He currently has a urethral stricture that requires surgical fixation.
